    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    CashierViewController
    Controller for the cashier / POS view.
    DatabaseUtil
    This class represents an object for DB connection
    EditItemController
    Controller for the main Manager Dashboard view.
    Employee
    Represents an employee in the system, including their ID, name, role, and active status.
    EmployeeController
    Controller for Employee management UI.
    Ingredient
    Model representing an ingredient in inventory.
    InventoryController
    Controller for Inventory management UI.
    Item
     
    ItemController
    Controller class for displaying and interacting with individual menu items.
    ItemDAO
    This class represents the Data Access Object for items.
    LoginController
    Controller class for the login screen.
    Main
    Entry point for the Bubble Tea POS JavaFX application.
    MainController
    Controller for the main application view.
    ManagerMenuController
    Controller for the main Manager Dashboard view.
    ManagerViewController
    Controller for the main Manager Dashboard view (Overview).
    OrderTrendsController
    Controller class for the Order Trends view in the manager dashboard.
    OrderTrendsController.Order
    Data Transfer Object representing an order with essential information.
    ProductUsageController
    Controller responsible for product usage UI, metrics and charts.
    ProductUsageData
    Represents the usage data for a product, including the item ID, name, timestamp of usage, quantity sold, and revenue generated.
